mapper.select: /* kr.ac.usu.user.mapper.UserImageUploadMapper.selectUserImageInfo */ WITH USERVIEW AS( SELECT STDNT_NO ID , ATCH_FILE_NO FROM STUDENT_INFORMATION UNION SELECT PRFSOR_NO ID , ATCH_FILE_NO FROM PROFESSOR UNION SELECT SKLSTF_NO ID , ATCH_FILE_NO FROM STAFF ) SELECT AF.ATCH_FILE_NO , ATCH_FILE_SN , ATCH_FILE_NM , ATCH_FILE_STRE_NM , ATCH_FILE_STRE_PATH , ATCH_FILE_MG , ATCH_FILE_INDICT_MG , ATCH_FILE_MIME_TYPE FROM USERVIEW UV INNER JOIN ATTACHING_FILE AF ON (AF.ATCH_FILE_NO = UV.ATCH_FILE_NO) WHERE UV.ID = #{id}
